nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i2
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I hit my head on the board.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i3
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I was very worried about something serious.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i4
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I was very worried that my wound had left blood in the pool.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i5
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: There was something more significant than winning.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: i6
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: I was very worried that I might infect other divers with AIDS as I spilled my blood in the pool.
